metadata.description: Neural Omnipresent Virtual Assistant - A personalized AI agent with memory and project management

metadata.scriptContent: npm run test && npm run test:web
echo 'ðŸ¤– Nova Agent Automation System v1.0.0 - Ready!'
npm run build && npm run test:wsl -- --run

metadata.description: AI-powered code editor with DeepSeek integration - A modern alternative to Cursor

metadata.scriptContent: NODE_ENV=production tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && vite build --mode production
concurrently "npm run dev:web" "wait-on http://localhost:3001 && npm run dev:electron"
npm run system:init && npm run dev
npm run typecheck && npm run typecheck:build && npm run typecheck:test
npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:run && npm run build
npm run lint:fix && npm run typecheck && npm run test:run
vite build && node scripts/pwa-build-optimizer.js && npx cap sync
vite build && node scripts/pwa-build-optimizer.js --optimizeImages true --generateWebP true --generateAVIF true
npm run build:mobile && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
npm run build:mobile && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
npm run android:bundle && npx @capacitor/cli deploy android --upload-keystore
npm run build:mobile && npx cap open ios
npm run build:mobile && xcodebuild -workspace ios/App/App.xcworkspace -scheme App -archivePath ios/App/build/App.xcarchive archive
npm run quality && npm run android:bundle
npm run quality && npm run ios:build
npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist

options.command: echo 'Skipping typecheck for shipping-pwa (has TS errors in service worker)'
